duties_responsibilities.duty: Collect all pertinent information over the phone for initial donation referral and simultaneously input data into the internal electronic medical record.
Approach families for donation, providing basic support and education.
Accurately complete the authorization & Donor Risk Assessment Interview necessary for donation.
Handle frequent changes within donor eligibility criteria while maintaining confidentiality of information.
Work in a collaborative team environment with a focus on accuracy through interruptions.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required. Associate degree or higher in healthcare or human services related field preferred.
